properties.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 1 at 12:15PM AKST until March 2 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Blowing snow and wind chills to 45 below occurring.
Visibility one half mile or less at times. Plan on difficult
travel conditions.

* WHERE...The Bering Strait Coast.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM Monday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will cause
areas of blowing and drifting snow.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of
blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST MONDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED
